member.name: T:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Conditions.AnonymousCondition
member.summary: Implements condition which select anonymous contacts.

member.name: M:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Conditions.AnonymousCondition.IsAccepted(Sitecore.XConnect.Contact)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified contact is accepted.
member.returns: true if the specified contact is accepted; otherwise, false.
